text:
Gienek Loska (; 8 January 1975 – 9 September 2020) was a Belarusian-born Polish singer-songwriter and guitarist. He was born in Byelaazyorsk, Belarus. He won the first series of "X Factor" in 2011. Loska was the co-founder and longtime member of the blues-rock band "Seven B".
Loska died on 9 September 2020 in Byelaazyorsk from a stroke, aged 45.
